page.title: 17ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: The area possesses the "usual forms" of community activities rural zones possess.These include both{Guide and {Scout troops}as well as{Brownie and {Cub}packs.These groups tend to hold their meetings in the{Village Halls.} There are regular{W.I. meetings}and a Valentine{Club}for the{elderly}meets monthly. { Drama groups}include the Funtington Players who regularly perform to full houses in the West Ashling village hall. A number of{Keep Fit,Dance and Yoga {classes}exist. The{Chichester Festival Theatre } provides the nearest top class entertainment whilst the nearest {cinema}is now at Havant.
